author: rhuijben
msg: Allow gracefull handling of the case where an 'mtcc' is opened on a file or
not existing node, by automatically reparenting one level up when allowed.
(svn_client_mtcc_create): Update api to allow anchoring higher.
(svn_client_mtcc_get_relpath): Update api to allow anchoring higher.
(svn_client_mtcc_create): Check if the anchor exist and handle the case where
(svn_client_mtcc_get_relpath): Allow requesting at least one level higher than
the passed url. (needed for things like mkdir)

author: vhennebert
msg: Attach the selected variant to KnuthPageNode in order to propagate the information down to area tree creation.
Patch by Seifeddine Dridi, applied with some modifications.

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove the editor v2 shims from the to be removed svnmucc editor driver. This
also removes an unneeded ra session that is never really used except for v2
(execute): Remove unneeded ra session, shims, etc.
Use primary ra session to check if we should move up a level.

author: rhuijben
msg: On my way to make 'svnmucc' usable for api users, remove some code that is
duplicated from within libsvn_client by creating a svn_client_ctx_t within
svnmucc and initializing the ra sessions from that.
(execute): Remove arguments that are handled via svn_client_ctx_t.
(sub_main): Add svn_client_ctx_t, initialize it and pass it.

author: lbernardo
msg: FOP-2326: CMYK TIFF is rendered using RGB colourspace in Postscript output; patch submitted by Simon Steiner (xgc jar updated)
